title: Braised steak with onions and mushrooms in a brandy beef gravy
ingredients: ['2 (200g) braising steaks', 'salt and pepper', '1 knob butter', 'a little olive oil', '1 large onion, sliced', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '1 glug brandy', '1 squirt tomato puree', '300ml beef stock', '1 bay leaf', '1 large handful mushrooms, thickly sliced', '1/4 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon water']
